label: Liturgical text (the blessing of the waters for Epiphany?)

work.desc_title: Blessing of the waters for Epiphany

note.value: Because of the frequent mention of St. John the Baptist and the Jordan River, it is possible that this is a liturgical text on the blessing of the waters for Epiphany

Bibliography: V. Gardthausen, Catalogus codicum Graecorum Sinaiticorum (Oxford, 1886), p. 108 ; For abbreviations of the editions see H. Follieri, Initia Hymnorum Ecclesiae Graecae, Studi e testi, 211-215bis (Vatican City, 1960-1966)
